pr_title: [KOGITO-3969] Reviewed ApplicationGenerator.logger usage + removed dead code

timeline.message: [KOGITO-3969] Reviewed ApplicationGenerator.logger usage + removed dead code

timeline.bodyText:
I know that you did it to avoid repetition but I don't love that we are now logging within the constructor of this class, because now it will probably log stuff that we may not really care about (eg resources)
OTOH: I never loved this logging; this stuff is dumped to disk sooner or later, so  it's much easier to read it from a file, rather than displayed on the console log.
So I am ok with the change, although it feels a bit strange (to me).
timeline.author: evacchi

replies.bodyText:
Yes I agree that it produce a lot of noise in the logs but my goal was to centralize it for now.
I moved the logging to generate() method of ApplicationGenerator so that it is not a side effect inside GeneratedFile constructor and it will be easier to change in the future (i.e. dump to disk instead of log).
Wdyt?
replies.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: I like it much better now!
